person.persName: John C. Monfort (Henry County judge and attorney)

body.p: A Kentucky merchant, judge, and attorney. Married twice, first to Mary Monfort, and on a second occasion to Matilda Monfort. Served as county judge of the Henry County Court from 1859 to 1865.
